title: Creamy Pasta Bake with Tomatoes and Mozzarella
instructions:
1. Peel and finely chop the onion and garlic. Remove seeds from the chili pepper and finely chop it as well. Wash and halve the cherry tomatoes. Grate the parmesan and roughly cube the mozzarella. Wash and dry the basil leaves. 
2. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
3. Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large pan and sauté the onion, garlic, and chili pepper. Add the crushed tomatoes and let the sauce simmer for a few minutes. Then stir in the cream and grated parmesan, and season the sauce with salt, pepper, and a good pinch of sugar. 
4. Once the pasta is done, drain it and add to the pan with the sauce. Remove the pan from the heat and fold in the halved cherry tomatoes and half of the mozzarella cubes. Cut the basil leaves into strips and add them as well. 
5. Transfer everything to a baking dish, sprinkle with the remaining mozzarella, and bake on the middle rack in a preheated oven at 200°C (180°C fan) for about 20 minutes.
